segments.text: Annie , do you like shopping online ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I like it , because it's convenient .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Last week , I tried to buy a new cellphone online , but I didn't know how to pay for it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , you should open an account at the online bank . After that , you can buy anything you want online .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . You can find everything all over the world . Let's check it out online ! ( They log in a shopping website . )
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's amazing . Oh , an on line virtual supermarket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's click to check it out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I got it . It simulates the real supermarket , which makes it feel so real . Mom will love it . She loves shopping in supermarkets .
segments.speaker: S1
